alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 8:39AM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Light wintry mix of light snow, light rain, and localized pockets of light freezing rain. * WHERE...The Continental Divide along the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Falling and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Many roadways and mountain passes remain slick this morning
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
